block.title: Configure This App
block.text: Configure the remote repository for the detection rules.

block.title: Repository
block.text: Use either the https or ssh repository clone url. Keep the Folder field empty if you want to use the whole repository.

block.title: TDM API Key
block.text: Enter your TDM API key here. Leave empty if you do not want to use SOC Prime TDM sigma rule feed.
To get a valid TDM API key go to tdm.socprime.com.
